evidence_in_dialogue: [[Daniel_Perez]] she's a giver - from the day she was born
[[Grissom]] sometimes rapists like to relive the event
[[Robbins]] young alicia donated bone marrow at least twice
[[Mia_Dickerson]] the blood on the mother's t-shirt matches the blood on the blanket
[[Warrick]] sees a shoe print that's familiar
[[Sara]] mining her body for healthy cells
[[Nick]] looks like the lividity marks on alicia's body
[[Daniel_Perez]] i could n't watch her suffer anymore
[[Grissom]] bone marrow, transfusions ... that's her blood in your veins
